{{Location Intro|description=<p>Vourukasha Oasis is the birthplace and homeland of the [[Pari]], who act as its guardians. It holds a "sea of pure dew" (Amrita) created from the remnants of the original Hydro Archon, [[Egeria]]. At the Oasis's center grows the Harvisptokhm, a giant tree that contains Egeria's remaining consciousness.</p>}}

Sometime after the [[Cataclysm]], Elder [[Zurvan]] of the Pari used the [[Great Song of Khvarena|Great Songs of Khvarena]] to seal off the Oasis following an attack by the [[Abyss]]. She has stated that she will only let in heroes who have formed bonds with Pari and pilgrims who wish to worship Egeria.<ref>{{Ref/Quest|The Splendorous Sky That Day}}</ref>
